```shell
[amtf@amtf-pc config]$ pacman -Ss teredo
community/miredo 1.2.6-4
   Teredo client and server. 
[amtf@amtf-pc config]$ sudo pacman -S miredo 
[sudo] password for amtf:  
resolving dependencies... 
looking for conflicting packages... 

Packages (2) judy-1.0.5-4  miredo-1.2.6-4 

Total Download Size:   0.19 MiB
Total Installed Size:  0.98 MiB

Readme online
http://git.remlab.net/gitweb/?p=miredo.git;a=blob_plain;f=README;hb=HEAD
配置DNS
http://jingyan.baidu.com/article/4853e1e579796c1909f726f4.html
# sudo vim /etc/resolv.conf
# generated by resolvconf
nameserver 2001:da8:202:10::36
nameserver 2001:da8:8000:1:202:120:2:100  
nameserver 202.96.134.133
nameserver 202.96.128.166
[amtf@amtf-pc config]$ sudo miredo -h
Usage: miredo [OPTIONS] [SERVER_NAME]
Creates a Teredo tunneling interface for encapsulation of IPv6 over UDP. 

 -c, --config     specify an configuration file 
 -f, --foreground run in the foreground 
 -h, --help       display this help and exit 
 -p, --pidfile    override the location of the PID file 
 -u, --user       override the user to set UID to 
 -V, --version    display program version and exit

此处 前台运行调试问题
[amtf@amtf-pc config]$ sudo miredo -f 
miredo[23237]: Starting... 
miredo[23238]: New Teredo address/MTU 
miredo[23238]: Teredo pseudo-tunnel started
miredo[23238]:  (address: 2001:0:53aa:64c:1c15:96a4:8e8b:9520, MTU: 1280)
[amtf@amtf-s3 ~]$ ip a   
6: teredo: <POINTOPOINT,MULTICAST,NOARP,UP,LOWER_UP> mtu 1280 qdisc fq_codel state UNKNOWN group default qlen 500 
   link/none  
   inet6 2001:0:53aa:64c:82e:4a01:48f4:d9f9/32 scope global  
      valid_lft forever preferred_lft forever 
   inet6 fe80::ffff:ffff:ffff/64 scope link  
      valid_lft forever preferred_lft forever 
   inet6 fe80::1a60:be0e:ef2a:94e9/64 scope link stable-privacy  
      valid_lft forever preferred_lft forever

[amtf@amtf-s3 ~]$ ping -6 ipv6.ustb.edu.cn
```
